text: A data Scientist analyzes complex data using python,statistic, and machine learning.Recommended roadmap:Python->statistic->Machine Learning->Deep Learning->Data Visualization.
AN AI Engineer designs intelligent system using python, Tensorflow,pytorch and  NLP. Recomended roadmap: python->Linear Algebra->Neural Network->Deep Learning
A Web developer Engineer manages CI/CD pipelones and automates Kubernets, and Cloud service Recomanded Roadmap: Linux->Git->Docker->Jenkins->Kubernets->Cloud
